articles.description: England face India in the first Test at Headingley - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India LIVE: First Test, day three, Headingley - cricket score, radio, highlights & updates

articles.description: The Premier League writes to Chelsea over the club's position with ticket re-sellers - amid controversy over Todd Boehly's involvement in Vivid Seats
articles.title: Premier League contact Chelsea over Boehly's Vivid Seats stake

articles.description: Harry Brook's sparkling 99 helps England almost match India's first-innings total, before Ben Stokes strikes to leave the first Test beautifully poised.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes strikes after Harry Brook hits 99 at Headingley

articles.description: World number two Carlos Alcaraz holds off a battling Jiri Lehecka to seal his second Queen's title with victory in an enthralling final.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Carlos Alcaraz beats Jiri Lehecka to win title

articles.description: Former England and Gloucestershire fast bowler David 'Syd' Lawrence dies at the age of 61 following a Motor Neurone Disease diagnosis last year.
articles.title: David 'Syd' Lawrence: Former England and Gloucestershire bowler dies following MND diagnosis

articles.description: Verbal jousting on British and Irish Lions tours is as much a part of the deal as the rugby itself - and the mind games started anew in recent days, writes Tom English.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Mind games as much a part of Lions folklore as rucks and mauls

articles.description: Manchester's Tom Aspinall is upgraded to undisputed heavyweight champion as the UFC announces Jon Jones' retirement.
articles.title: UFC: Jon Jones retires, Tom Aspinall upgraded to undisputed heavyweight champion

articles.description: Jobe Bellingham's first goal for Borussia Dortmund mirrors his brother Jude's start to life at the Bundesliga club, and fuels more comparisons between the siblings.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Jobe Bellingham says 'I always practise that' after fuelling Jude comparisons with first Dortmund goal

articles.description: Many others were injured when a barrier collapsed as MC Alger fans celebrated winning the league, reports say.
articles.title: MC Alger supporters die falling from Algerian football stadium

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Xabi Alonso says striker Kylain Mbappe is "better" after an illness but will miss his side's Fifa Club World Cup match against Pachuca.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid forward 'better' but will miss Fifa Club World Cup game against Pachuca
